summary.description: > LOW CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'castlemountain', 'ultrasound', 'multiplanar', 'web-based' | Web-Based GPU-Accelerated Application for Multiplanar Reconstructions from Conventional 2D Ultrasound | ImagingAnatomy.com is an interactive atlas of normal imaging anatomy for the radiologist as well as a learning device for health professionals in general studying anatomy for any reason | Sonoviewer is an open access web application developed as an extension of the Mulrecon web-based viewer
summary.name: sonoviewer
